CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 7, 1958, p. A3, reads: "Last Drink - Member from far and near gave Loendi a gay and festive air over the week-end, reminiscent of its halcyon days, as "spirits" flowed freely."
TitMainTitle: Men, and women, including one wearing eyeglasses, light colored dress, and triangular rhinestone earrings, gathered behind bar with bottles in glasses, in Loendi Club, with fan and clock in background
